episodes.title: Kenyan Cult Leader Goes on Trial for Terrorism Charges Over Followers' Deaths
episodes.description:
In East Africa, the leader of a Kenyan doomsday cult, Paul Nthenge Mackenzie, is on trial for terrorism charges related to the deaths of over 400 of his followers. The macabre case has shocked the world. Mackenzie appeared in court in Mombasa along with 94 co-defendants. Journalists were removed from the courtroom shortly after the hearing began to enable a protected witness to testify. Stay tuned for updates and detailed coverage of this significant trial.
